errors.error_description: The pip commands are in wrong order - aqtinstall is installed before updating pip
correction_candidates:
pip install -U pip
pip install aqtinstall

pip install --upgrade pip
pip install aqtinstall

python -m pip install --upgrade pip
pip install aqtinstall

pip3 install -U pip
pip3 install aqtinstall
errors.golden_answer:
pip install -U pip
pip install aqtinstall
